Our final event will feature a series of five "TED Talks" by our members on the markets they have researched over the semester with the funds. To make this even more exciting, we are pleased to host our incredible guest list, which includes Lior Handelsman, Harel Beit-On, Liron Wand, Pnina Ben Ami, Alexandre Dahan, & Shir Kahanov. We want to thank all the funds' representatives who worked closely with our members throughout the semester to perfect their research and ensure they met the exact needs of the funds - ğ’‚ ğ’‰ğ’–ğ’ˆğ’† ğ’”ğ’‰ğ’ğ’–ğ’•ğ’ğ’–ğ’• ğ’•ğ’ Lee Shmulevitz, Tal Abuloff, and Roi YosefğŸ™ And a massive thank you to all our additional lecturers this year for providing us with the right tools for these incredible projects: Zaki Djemal, Hadar Siterman Norris, Erel N. We are honored to present Roi Yosef, Senior Associate at Jerusalem Venture Partners (JVP) ğŸ‰ Roi is a key member of the investment team at JVP, one of Israel's largest VCs with $1.75Bn assets under management, 12 NASDAQ IPOs, and 39 exits. At JVP, Roi focuses on early to mid-stage investments and provides strategic direction and advice to the fund's various portfolio companies. During his military service, Roi served as an Intelligence Officer in the Israeli intelligence unit. Following his service, he co-founded Cyber-School, an educational organization specializing in cyber training with an annual enrollment of 1,500+ students and 150+ institutional partners. Roi holds a double major in Law and Accounting from The Hebrew University of Jerusalem and started his career at Goldfarb Seligman, where he advised public companies on high-profile transactions. Roi later gained experience at EY, where he served as a Strategy and Transactions Senior Consultant, leading due diligence for M&A and investment transactions in the cyber, IoT, and gaming industries. ğ‚ğ®ğ«ğ«ğğ§ğ­ğ¥ğ², ğ‘ğ¨ğ¢ ğ¬ğğ«ğ¯ğğ¬ ğšğ¬ ğš ğğ¨ğšğ«ğ ğŒğğ¦ğ›ğğ« ğŸğ¨ğ« ğ¬ğğ¯ğğ«ğšğ¥ ğœğ¨ğ¦ğ©ğšğ§ğ¢ğğ¬, ğ¢ğ§ğœğ¥ğ®ğğ¢ğ§ğ : â¡ Morphisec: Offers endpoint threat prevention with its patented Automated Moving Target Defense (AMTD) technology. â¡ Agrint Inc.: Revolutionizes agriculture with early and precise IoT solutions for pest-infested trees. â¡ Opora: A cyber threat intelligence company using behavior analytics to monitor and contain cyber threats. ğ˜—ğ˜­ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜´ğ˜¦ ğ˜«ğ˜°ğ˜ªğ˜¯ ğ˜¶ğ˜´ ğ˜ªğ˜¯ ğ˜¸ğ˜¦ğ˜­ğ˜¤ğ˜°ğ˜®ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜™ğ˜°ğ˜ª ğ˜ ğ˜°ğ˜´ğ˜¦ğ˜§ ğ˜µğ˜° ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¦ ğ˜ğ˜œğ˜‘ğ˜ ğ˜ğ˜Š ğ˜Šğ˜­ğ˜¶ğ˜£ - ğ˜´ğ˜µğ˜¢ğ˜º ğ˜µğ˜¶ğ˜¯ğ˜¦ğ˜¥ ğ˜§ğ˜°ğ˜³ ğ˜®ğ˜°ğ˜³ğ˜¦ ğ˜¶ğ˜±ğ˜¥ğ˜¢ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜´ ğŸ“ˆ

We are excited to introduce Ori Ziring as the next host of HUJI VC Club's 'Meet the Member' series ğŸ‰ Ori is a second-year PPE (Philosophy, Politics, and Economics) student. She is deeply fascinated by the intersection of financial markets and public policy and the ability to navigate public behavior through market mechanisms. Currently, she serves as ğ­ğ¡ğ ğ‚ğ¡ğšğ¢ğ«ğ°ğ¨ğ¦ğšğ§ ğ¨ğŸ the Jerusalem PPE Convention, a student-led conference that hosts leading figures from the public sector, industry, academia, and policymakers. As part of our series, Ori authored an in-depth exploration of Kinoko-Tech, an incredible food tech company that leverages fungi fermentation to create sustainable superfoods ğŸ„ ğ‘¶ğ’“ğ’Š ğ’Šğ’” ğ’‚ğ’—ğ’‚ğ’Šğ’ğ’‚ğ’ƒğ’ğ’† ğ’‡ğ’ğ’“ ğ’‡ğ’–ğ’“ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’†ğ’“ ğ’…ğ’Šğ’”ğ’„ğ’–ğ’”ğ’”ğ’Šğ’ğ’ ğ’ğ’ ğ’‰ğ’†ğ’“ ğ‘³ğ’Šğ’ğ’Œğ’†ğ’…ğ‘°ğ’ ğ’‘ğ’“ğ’ğ’‡ğ’Šğ’ğ’† ğ„ğ§ğ£ğ¨ğ²!

Get ready to meet Itamar Vaknin, our next highlight in the HUJI VC Club's 'Meet the Member' series! ğŸŒŸ Itamar, 26, is a bachelor's student in Political Science and Education and participates in the ×”××›×œ×œ×” ×œ××“×™× ××•×ª - The Jewish Statesmanship Center's Identity and Public Policy Program. As ASPER-HUJI Innovate's community coordinator and former parliamentary advisor to the Municipality of Jerusalem, Itamar has extensive expertise in public and social activism. In our series, Itamar presents his analysis of Masterschool, an educational startup founded in 2019. Through his article, Itamar explains how Masterschool equips students with vital skills for today's dynamic tech job market, highlighting its innovative education model where students pay tuition only after securing employment. ğ‘¬ğ’ğ’‹ğ’ğ’š!

Continuing his exploration, Idan Keynan brings us closer to the cutting-edge applications of quantum computing in his analysis of QuEra Computing Inc., a leader in the quantum computing industry. In his article, Idan explains how QuEra is pioneering the use of neutral-atom technology to address complex problems that traditional computers cannot solve, their innovative strategies, their potential to impact various scientific and technological fields, and much more. Join us as we explore QuEraâ€™s journey toward redefining the future of computing âœ¨

We are excited to introduce Idan Keynan as the host of our quantum week as a part of our Meet the Member series ğŸŒŸ Idan, a student in Electrical Engineering and Applied Physics, has a remarkable background and several prestigious roles. As a combat soldier, he initiated and led the first quantum initiative in the IDF and later served as an Innovation Manager in the 81-unit accelerator. After his military service, Idan began working for the Prime Minister's Office to lead all quantum initiatives and recently completed his internship at Group 11 VC, guided by Dovi Francis. ğ“ğ¡ğ¢ğ¬ ğ°ğğğ¤, ğˆğğšğ§ ğ¬ğ¡ğšğ«ğğ¬ ğ¡ğ¢ğ¬ ğğ±ğ©ğğ«ğ­ğ¢ğ¬ğ ğ¢ğ§ ğ­ğ°ğ¨ ğ¢ğ§ğœğ«ğğğ¢ğ›ğ¥ğ ğšğ«ğ­ğ¢ğœğ¥ğğ¬: One explores the world of Quantum Computing, and another (on Wednesday) provides a deep dive into QuEra Computing Inc., a leading company in the quantum computing industry. ğ‘°ğ’…ğ’‚ğ’ ğ’Šğ’” ğ’‚ğ’—ğ’‚ğ’Šğ’ğ’‚ğ’ƒğ’ğ’† ğ’‡ğ’ğ’“ ğ’‡ğ’–ğ’“ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’†ğ’“ ğ’…ğ’Šğ’”ğ’„ğ’–ğ’”ğ’”ğ’Šğ’ğ’ ğ’ğ’ ğ’‰ğ’Šğ’” ğ‘³ğ’Šğ’ğ’Œğ’†ğ’…ğ‘°ğ’ ğ’‘ğ’“ğ’ğ’‡ğ’Šğ’ğ’† ğ„ğ§ğ£ğ¨ğ²!

We are honored to present Tal Abuloff, senior associate at Grove Ventures! To fully appreciate why we are so excited, let's get to know Tal ğŸ‘‡ After completing her service in the Israeli military's intelligence unit 8200, Tal began her career in the tech ecosystem at Volicon, which was later acquired by Verizon. Tal started her academic journey at Tel Aviv University, studying law, where she served as the Editor-in-chief of the Tel-Aviv University Law Review and graduated magna cum laude in the top 1% of her class. She also interned as a judicial law clerk at the Supreme Court of Israel in the chambers of Deputy Chief Justice Hanan Melcer. Later, Tal furthered her education at Harvard, earning her Master of Law (LLM) on a full scholarship with a thesis on venture capital law and policy. After Harvard, Tal joined Grove Ventures, taking an active role in sourcing deal flow, engaging with entrepreneurs, overseeing due diligence, and supporting Grove's portfolio companies. Tal plays a vital part in Grove's investment process, from the initial introduction to the term sheet. ğ˜‰ğ˜›ğ˜ - ğ˜›ğ˜¢ğ˜­ ğ˜©ğ˜¢ğ˜´ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ ğ˜¢ğ˜¤ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜·ğ˜¦ ğ˜¢ğ˜¤ğ˜¤ğ˜°ğ˜¶ğ˜¯ğ˜µ ğ˜°ğ˜¯ ğ˜Ÿ (ğ˜°ğ˜³ ğ˜›ğ˜¸ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜³, ğ˜¸ğ˜©ğ˜¢ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜·ğ˜¦ğ˜³ ğ˜ºğ˜°ğ˜¶ ğ˜¸ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜µ ğ˜µğ˜° ğ˜¤ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜­ ğ˜ªğ˜µ) ğ˜¸ğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜¦ ğ˜´ğ˜©ğ˜¦ ğ˜´ğ˜©ğ˜¢ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜´ ğ˜¢ ğ˜­ğ˜°ğ˜µ ğ˜°ğ˜§ ğ˜¨ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜µ ğ˜¤ğ˜°ğ˜¯ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¯ğ˜µ - ğ˜¸ğ˜¦ ğ˜©ğ˜ªğ˜¨ğ˜©ğ˜­ğ˜º ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜¤ğ˜°ğ˜®ğ˜®ğ˜¦ğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜§ğ˜°ğ˜­ğ˜­ğ˜°ğ˜¸ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜³: ğ˜©ğ˜µğ˜µğ˜±ğ˜´://ğ˜µğ˜¸ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜³.ğ˜¤ğ˜°ğ˜®/ğ˜›ğ˜ˆğ˜£ğ˜¶ğ˜­ğ˜°ğ˜§ğ˜§ We can't wait to host Tal this week and share her invaluable insights! Please join us in welcoming Tal to the HUJI VC Club - stay tuned for more updates ğŸ“ˆ

We are super excited to introduce Ido Nir as the next host in the HUJI VC Club's 'Meet the Member' series - let's just say that he gave the term "Gaon" group a new meaning ğŸ˜‰ Ido, a 24-year-old from Haifa, is a Bachelor's student in Electrical Engineering and Applied Physics. Ido works as a research assistant at The Ultrafast Laser Lab and as an R&D software development student at Teramount (ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¤ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜¥ğ˜ªğ˜£ğ˜­ğ˜¦ ğ˜´ğ˜µğ˜¢ğ˜³ğ˜µğ˜¶ğ˜± ğ˜ºğ˜°ğ˜¶ ğ˜´ğ˜©ğ˜°ğ˜¶ğ˜­ğ˜¥ ğ˜¥ğ˜¦ğ˜§ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜­ğ˜º ğ˜¤ğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜¤ğ˜¬ ğ˜°ğ˜¶ğ˜µ). As part of our series, Ido shared his thorough analysis of Gaon Group, Israel's leading flow infrastructure group. In his article, Ido explores the challenges in water-related technologies and cleantech, emphasizing Gaon Group's significant role in advancing solutions that cater to global municipal and industrial clients. It is a must-read. ğ‘¬ğ’ğ’‹ğ’ğ’š!
